name: White cavity fillings
description: White (composite) fillings are made out of powdered glass and ceramic added to a resin base, which comes out to a shade of white which matches your teeth..

name: Dental crowns
description: How long do dental crowns last The average lifespan for a well-maintained dental crown is typically around 15 years. However, when taken care of properly, it is common to see them last upwards of 25-30 years

name: Gum disease treatments
description: Topical or oral antibiotics can help control bacterial infection. Topical antibiotics can include antibiotic mouth rinses or insertion of gels containing antibiotics in the space between your teeth and gums

name: Botox for TMJ, head, & facial pain
description: Beyond aesthetic improvements, Botox treats common dental concerns like jaw pain, headaches, migraines, and clenching

name: Dentures
description: Replace missing teeth! Full and partial dentures created with top-of-the-line materials restore your ability to chew, speak, and smile.

name: Nightguards/mouthguards
description: Stop grinding your teeth at night and protect your teeth during sports with a custom-made mouthguard.
